main event: A civilian reported observing a single unidentified object traveling in a straight line at high altitude in Hamptonville, North Carolina, on February 25, 1953.
interesting points: The observation lasted between 5 to 7 minutes,The witness reported the object was seen at a high altitude,The object's course was uncertain yet described as a straight line movement,There was no physical evidence supporting the observation,The report concluded with insufficient data for firm evaluation, suggesting the object could possibly be a balloon.
witness description: The witness was a 37-year-old male farmer with grade school education.
